DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see the default filter state when the page loads
TEST STEPS:
1. Navigate to Case Management page
2. Observe filter dropdowns
EXPECTED RESULT: All four filters (TOC, Class, Depot, Unit) show "All" by default. All cases are displayed in the table.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can filter cases by TOC
TEST STEPS:
1. Click TOC dropdown
2. Select a specific TOC (e.g., "GWR")
3. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Only cases for selected TOC are displayed. Summary counters update to reflect filtered cases. Train diagram updates if applicable.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can filter cases by Class
TEST STEPS:
1. Click Class dropdown
2. Select a specific Class (e.g., "Class 165")
3. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Only cases for selected Class are displayed. Summary counters and train diagram update accordingly.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can filter cases by Depot
TEST STEPS:
1. Click Depot dropdown
2. Select a specific Depot
3. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Only cases for selected Depot are displayed. Summary counters update.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can filter cases by Unit
TEST STEPS:
1. Click Unit dropdown
2. Select a specific Unit (e.g., "150208")
3. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Only cases for selected Unit are displayed. Summary counters update. Train diagram shows only the selected unit.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can filter cases using multiple criteria with cascading dropdowns
TEST STEPS:
1. Select TOC = "XCT"
2. Observe Class, Depot, and Unit dropdowns now show only options available for XCT
3. Select a Class from the filtered options
4. Select a Depot from the filtered options
5. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Only cases matching ALL selected criteria are displayed. Dropdowns cascade to show only relevant options based on previous selections. Counters update accordingly.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can apply filters using the Apply button
TEST STEPS:
1. Select any filter value
2. DO NOT click Apply
3. Observe case list (should not change)
4. Click Apply
5. Observe case list updates
EXPECTED RESULT: Filter is not applied until Apply button is clicked. Cases update only after Apply is clicked.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can clear all filters using the Clear button
TEST STEPS:
1. Select values in multiple filters
2. Click Apply
3. Click Clear button
EXPECTED RESULT: All filters reset to "All". All cases are displayed again. Summary counters show totals for all cases.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see appropriate messaging when filters return no results
TEST STEPS:
1. Select filter combination that has no matching cases
2. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Case table shows "No cases found" or empty state. Summary counters show 0 for all categories. Train diagram shows no units or appropriate empty state.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see summary counters update when filters are applied
TEST STEPS:
1. Note initial counter values (Total, New, Completed, Monitor, Rejected)
2. Apply any filter
3. Compare counter values
EXPECTED RESULT: Counters show counts only for filtered cases (e.g., if 2 rejected cases are visible after filter, Rejected counter shows 2).

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see the train diagram update when filtering by Unit
TEST STEPS:
1. Select specific Unit from Unit filter
2. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Counters show counts only for the selected Unit. The train diagram is also updated to the respective image. The cases shown are specfic to the selected Unit.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see filters cascade based on my selections
EXPECTED RESULT: Class dropdown shows only classes relevant to selected TOC.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see my filter selections persist during my session
TEST STEPS:
1. Apply specific filters
2. Click on a case to view details
3. Return to case list page
EXPECTED RESULT: Previously applied filters remain selected. Case list shows filtered results.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can change individual filters back to All while keeping other filters active
TEST STEPS:
1. Select TOC, Class, and Depot filters
2. Click Apply
3. Change TOC back to "All"
4. Click Apply
EXPECTED RESULT: Cases now filtered only by Class and Depot. TOC filter is effectively removed.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see all required columns in filtered case results
TEST STEPS:
1. Apply any filter
2. Review case table
EXPECTED RESULT: Filtered cases display all columns: ID, Unit, Vehicle, System, Status, Priority, Title, Date.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can navigate through paginated filtered results
TEST STEPS:
1. Apply filter that returns more than 100 cases
2. Check pagination at bottom of table
EXPECTED RESULT: Pagination shows correct page count for filtered results (e.g., "1-4 of 150"). Navigation works correctly.

DESCRIPTION: As a user I can see all available filter options in the dropdowns
TEST STEPS:
1. Click TOC dropdown
2. Click Class dropdown
3. Click Depot dropdown
4. Click Unit dropdown
EXPECTED RESULT: All dropdowns show "All" option plus all available values from database (TOCs, Classes, Depots, Units).
